title: PSA: Disruption Icon is now out!
body:
Mine included some project cores, 2 Augment Cache Fragments and a blueprint for Project: Yi. 

The blueprint required 11 project cores to unlock the skin shard.

Go get one and tell us what you got (and how much it costs).

replies.body: I got the fiora one, i already own the fiora (from these Augment Cache's no less).
I didnt get the icon for mine :(
I got Project Lucian, unlocked it to shard, but need 300 essence......feelsbadman
I got a blueprint for project Fiora skin shard, which is the only project:overdrive skin that I actually DO own. XD So that was unlucky for me.

I can't believe how confusing they made this. Like an idiot I went and burnt cores on a stupid icon thinking it was the skin. Now I have a Project: Lucian skin shard and 7 cores :'(

Please Riot! let me try again...
I got project zed, one of the 2 project champions i dont own :( feelsbadman
